header.title: Pro-Course: Python Development
header.description: An intensive course to master Python programming, covering everything from basics to advanced concepts and real-world application deployment.

whatYoullLearn: Master Python syntax and programming fundamentals
Create object-oriented programs with clean, maintainable code
Develop real-world applications and automation scripts
Handle file operations and data manipulation
Build data structures and implement algorithms effectively
Work with popular libraries like Pandas, NumPy, and Matplotlib
Debug and optimize Python code for better performance
Apply Python for web scraping and API integration
overview: This course is a comprehensive deep dive into Python, taking you from the basics to advanced topics. You'll learn the fundamental concepts, explore advanced data manipulation with libraries, and apply your skills to build practical, full-stack applications.
targetAudience: Beginners with basic computer literacy
Developers looking to switch to Python
Analysts wanting to use Python for data science
prerequisites: Access to a computer with internet

instructor.name: Dr. Muhammad Hamid
instructor.designation: Assistant Professor, GC Women University, Sialkot
instructor.bio: Dr. Hamid has published 30+ research papers and supervised multiple programming & AI projects. He specializes in making complex programming concepts accessible to beginners.

learningOutcomes: Understand Python syntax and programming flow
Apply data structures and functions effectively
Work with data using Pandas and NumPy
Deploy Python applications to the web

modules.title: Welcome to Python Programming
modules.description: Introduction to Python, course overview, and setting up your development environment

modules.title: Introduction to Python
modules.description: History, features, and applications of Python in various domains

modules.title: Python Basics
modules.description: Understanding core data types, variables, and basic operations.

modules.title: Data Structures
modules.description: Master lists, tuples, dictionaries, and sets

modules.title: File Handling
modules.description: Read and write files in Python

modules.title: Modules and Packages
modules.description: Organize code with modules and packages

modules.title: Error Handling and Debugging
modules.description: Handle exceptions and debug Python code

modules.title: Object-Oriented Programming (OOP)
modules.description: Learn classes, objects, and OOP principles

modules.title: Working with Libraries
modules.description: Use NumPy, Pandas, and Matplotlib for data work

header.title: Generative AI
header.description: Explore the capabilities of Generative AI. Learn to design models that create text, images, and more.

whatYoullLearn: Introduction to generative models and their applications
Understanding GANs, VAEs, and Diffusion Models
Practical content generation for text, images, and audio
Working with Large Language Models like GPT
overview: This course introduces the fundamentals of Generative AI, covering model architectures, training techniques, and real-world applications across text, images, audio, and code generation.
targetAudience: AI enthusiasts wanting to learn generative models
Developers with basic Python knowledge
Data scientists looking to expand into generative AI
prerequisites: Understanding of basic machine learning concepts
Access to a computer with GPU (recommended)

instructor.name: Dr. Muhammad Hamid
instructor.designation: Assistant Professor, GC Women University, Sialkot
instructor.bio: Dr. Hamid has published 30+ research papers in AI and worked on cutting-edge projects in Canada during his Ph.D. His expertise includes AI, Software Engineering, and Intelligent Systems.

learningOutcomes: Understand the foundations of generative AI models
Build and train GANs for image generation
Work with Large Language Models for text generation
Create audio and video using AI tools
Deploy AI applications using cloud platforms

modules.description: Evolution and applications of Generative AI

modules.description: Neural networks and optimization for Generative AI

modules.description: Deploy AI solutions using APIs and cloud

modules.description: Complete a real-world Generative AI project

header.title: Machine Learning
header.description: Dive into machine learning algorithms and techniques to build predictive models and solve real-world problems.

whatYoullLearn: Core ML algorithms and their applications
Neural networks and deep learning basics
Support Vector Machines and decision trees
overview: This course provides a comprehensive introduction to machine learning including supervised, unsupervised learning methods, and practical applications using real-world datasets.
targetAudience: Aspiring data scientists and ML engineers
Developers with Python knowledge
Students interested in AI and data analysis

instructor.name: Dr. Muhammad Hamid
instructor.designation: Assistant Professor, GC Women University, Sialkot
instructor.bio: Dr. Hamid has published 30+ research papers in AI and Machine Learning. He specializes in making complex ML concepts accessible to learners.

header.title: Chatbot Development
header.description: Learn to design and develop intelligent chatbots using modern AI and NLP techniques.

whatYoullLearn: Integrating chatbots with platforms and APIs
Ethics and responsible AI in chatbots
overview: This course covers chatbot architecture, natural language processing, and integration with messaging platforms to build intelligent conversational agents.
targetAudience: Developers interested in conversational AI
Business professionals wanting chatbot solutions
Students with basic Python knowledge

instructor.name: Dr. Muhammad Hamid
instructor.designation: Assistant Professor, GC Women University, Sialkot
instructor.bio: Dr. Hamid has extensive experience in AI and NLP, having published 30+ research papers and supervised multiple chatbot projects.

learningOutcomes: Build chatbots using Python and NLP

header.title: MERN Stack Development
header.description: Become proficient in the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) to build dynamic web applications.

whatYoullLearn: Setting up a MERN project from scratch
Building RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express
overview: This course guides you through building RESTful APIs and dynamic user interfaces using the MERN stack, covering frontend, backend, and database integration.
targetAudience: Developers wanting to learn full-stack development
Frontend developers expanding to backend
Students with JavaScript knowledge

instructor.name: Mahnoor Sarfraz
instructor.bio: Mahnoor is a skilled React Developer with practical industry exposure. She brings an efficient and beginner-friendly teaching style to help students master the MERN stack.

Anyone interested in building websites

overview: This course covers server-side concepts, RESTful API design with ASP.NET Core, and database integration for building scalable enterprise-grade backend applications.

Anyone interested in enterprise application development
